Sections.Name: criticalHits
Sections.Description: Settings for the Critical Hits mod.

Keys.Name: playerChance
Keys.Description: The player critical strike skill is divided by this number. Lower means you will land more crits!

Keys.Name: enemyChance
Keys.Description: The enemy critical strike skill is divided by this number. Lower means they will land more crits!

Keys.Name: criticalDamageBasePlayer
Keys.Description: Divide the critical strike Skill by 25 then multiply by this number to calculate Damage.

Keys.Name: criticalDamageBaseEnemy
Keys.Description: Divide the critical strike Skill by 25 then multiply by this number to calculate Damage.

Keys.Name: showCritMessage
Keys.Description: Show a message when the player lands a critical hit.
